mapper.select: select staff_id, staff_phone, staff_rank, ride_code, log_count, staff_name from staff
select staff_id, staff_phone, staff_rank, ride_code, log_count, staff_name from staff where staff_id = #{ staffId }
select staff_id, staff_phone, staff_rank, ride_code, log_count, staff_name from staff where ride_code = #{ rideCode }
